oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: J. B. Crick correspondence with John T. Wilder, 1864 March 22
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Crick, J. B.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Letter from J. B. Crick to Colonel Wilder describing Confederate troop movements. Crick also mentions the problems arming the soldiers in Wilder's Brigade during Wilder's absence.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Spencer rifle; United States -- History -- Civil War, 1861-1865; War horses
Wilder, John Thomas, 1830-1917
Confederate States of America. Army; United States. Army. Wilder's Brigade

oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: John T. Wilder military records and correspondence, 1862-1865
